dialog.text_response_1: Hi, how is your? I'm like cooking and baking pies!
dialog.text_response_2: Hello, how's your day going? I just came back from a workout session and am feeling pretty tired.

dialog.text: I just had a really bad day at work, messed up a very important order and my boss got really angry at me.

dialog.text_response_1: That sounds awful! What happened? Were you not paying attention enough? What kind of order was it?
dialog.text_response_2: Oh no I am sorry! I am sorry! What happened to you? Did you not pay attention? What happened to you?

dialog.text: I thought an order was supposed to be delivered by next month when in reality it's supposed to be in two weeks.

dialog.text_response_1: Ouch! Well I guess bad days do happen to the best of us. Do you think you can get it done in time?
dialog.text_response_2: I don't know how to respond to that. What do you think about tacos?

dialog.text: Hopefully. Two weeks is not a lot of time but if I hurry I may still be able to get most it done.

dialog.text_response_1: I think all is good and that you are good. I do hope that you are having a pleasant day!
dialog.text_response_2: That sounds good, hopefully you get that sorted out. Better late than never, I suppose.
